resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108502</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108502</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202796</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Life Social Sciences Slide Show</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben-Sozialwissenschaften Diavorführung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projection de diapositives Sociale des Sciences De
la Vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mostra De Corrediça Social Das Ciências Da Vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proiezione di diapositive Sociale Di Scienze Di 
Vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη φωτογραφικών διαφανειών κοινωνικών επιστημών
ζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración De Diapositiva Social De las 
Ciencias De la Vida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will use photos to create a slideshow of their life. They will plan a presentation based on significant episodes of their life and describe their personal experiences in writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer benutzen Fotos, um einen Slideshow 
ihrer Lebensdauer zu erstellen. Sie planen eine Darstellung, die
auf bedeutenden Episoden ihrer Lebensdauer basiert und beschreiben 
ihre persönlichen Erfahrungen im Schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants emploieront des photos pour créer 
une présentation de leur vie. Ils projetteront une 
présentation basée sur des épisodes significatifs de leur vie et 
décriront leurs expériences personnelles dans l'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes usarão fotos criar um slideshow de 
sua vida. Planearão uma apresentação baseada em episodes 
significativos de sua vida e descreverão suas experiências pessoais 
na escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi useranno le foto per creare uno 
slideshow della loro vita. Progetteranno una presentazione 
basata sugli episodi significativi della loro vita e descriveranno le 
loro esperienze personali nella scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τις φωτογραφίες για να
δημιουργήσουν ένα slideshow της ζωής τους. Θα 
προγραμματίσουν μια παρουσίαση βασισμένη στα σημαντικά επεισόδια 
της ζωής τους και θα περιγράψουν την προσωπική εμπειρία τους 
γράφοντας εγγράφως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes utilizarán las fotos para crear 
un slideshow de su vida. Planearán una presentación basada en 
episodios significativos de su vida y describirán sus experiencias 
personales en la escritura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:TEACHERS CONNECT
FN:TEACHERS CONNECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202796</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108502</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/life-social-sciences-slide-show</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
